__e: But no, the agents of darkness are among us, friend, and they are as real as you, or you, or you, or I.
I want you to know that my feelings for you were and always will be more real than anything I've ever known.
The feelings we have for each other are As real as anything we've ever experienced.
My uncle insisted monsters were real, and he should have known because he was one.
Maybe there was a time when the feelings were real and we could have had a real relationship, but the moment that you aligned yourself with your father, it was all over.
Not rumors, they're very real, and they've taken Sarah, so I need you to tell me where they took my sister.
